pr:sect2.pr:title: Notational conventions
pr:sect2.pr:para: The keywords "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHOULD NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC2119. It is essential that the reader of the Standard fully understands RFC2119 before attempting to implement Web Services conformant to the Standard. In particular, it is very important that the keywords SHOULD or RECOMMENDED are not misinterpreted as “optional” and that the subtle difference between keywords RECOMMENDED and MUST is fully understood. RFC2119 is a three page document.
